title: Multiple hypnotic inductions with Magnetism & non-verbal hypnosis / Quantum techniques
description:
Multiple hypnotic inductions with Magnetism & non-verbal hypnosis on Dr. Marco Paret's masterclass. His students exercise the techniques they learned directly from him and enter in deep hypnotic states, that liberate them and connect them to their deepest selves. NLP hypnosis schools and can be complementary, opening up new perspectives for you.This can be helpful for your personal growth and for becoming a better hypnotherapist. Use it for personal growth or to help others. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
